properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
c1
verse.lines: Only Believe, Only Believe, All Things Are Possible, Only Believe; Only Believe, Only Believe, All Things Are Possible, Only Believe.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Fear Not, Little Flock, He Goeth Ahead, Your Shepherd Selecteth The Path You Must Tread; The Waters Of Marah He’ll Sweeten For Thee, He Drank All The Bitter In Gethsemane.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Fear Not, Little Flock, What Ever Your Lot, He Enters All Rooms,” The Doors Being Shut;” He Never Forsakes, He Never Is Gone, So Count On His Presence In Darkness And Dawn.
